title: can we get Yi a skin that's worth it ?
body: im a main yi for a long time and i almost have all his skins.. the things is that none of his skins is actually good. dont misunderstand me.. i dont say that his skins like project and the other's are bad.. he just hasn't got any epic skin that it's actually worth.. he deserves better skins.. i think it would be a pretty dope idea for yi getting a new skin at this year's VS event..  i really would like to hear your thoughts about this.. {{champion:11}}
